categories: Category:Conflicts of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: The Malkhani Insurrections was a contained conflict that took place on the planet of Crucival thirteen years after the Clone Wars and lasted more than forty-seven days. It pitted the clan of the warlord Malkhan against other factions that sought to control Crucival. Eventually, Malkhan died, and his lieutenants each staked a claim to his cache of offworld weapons. An unprecedented bloodletting ensued, and all the former warriors of Malkhan, who now lacked an army to serve, fell into misery and deprivation.
